<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_twilio_direct_callback_test</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_twilio_direct_callback_test">stateINsuccess,failure,canceled,test_failure^EQ<item display_value="success,failure,canceled,test_failure" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="success,failure,canceled,test_failure"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Calculate test duration</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var start = current.started_on.dateNumericValue(); var end = current.ended_on.dateNumericValue();
if (current.duration.nil()) { current.duration = new GlideDuration(end-start); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-02-01 12:18:22</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>0577ce2a871b2300560cd61e36cb0bca</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Calculate test duration</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Twilio Direct Driver" source="sn_twilio_direct">3981f1d387021300b18a046787cb0b1d</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Twilio Direct Driver">3981f1d387021300b18a046787cb0b1d</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0577ce2a871b2300560cd61e36cb0bca</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-02-16 16:11:45</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0577ce2a871b2300560cd61e36cb0bca"/> </record_update>
